name: Snowstorm Rescue
description:
You have to find 3 missing people and bring them back to the location you start the game in. You have 4 minutes to do it.

Avoid freezing to death by lighting campfires and getting warm. To start fire you need matches and 3 logs. Get logs by cutting trees down with an axe.

Controls:

WASD - move

E - open chest, light a bonefire, rescue a person

Tab - inventory

LMB / left ctrl - use axe
